Title: Relates to reporting requirements for payment settlement entities, third party settlement organizations and electronic payment facilitators
Summary: Relates to reporting requirements for payment settlement entities, third party settlement organizations and electronic payment facilitators; requires reporting when the gross amount paid in settlement is $600 or greater regardless of the number of transactions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to reporting requirements for payment settlement entities, third party settlement organizations and electronic payment facilitators
